CatDescriptText: Raymond Davis, 2128 Forbes Street, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 8, 1958, pg. 3 with question: "Do you think that discrimination and segregation exist in Pittsburgh public school system?" Answer reads: "No, I don't think that there is a whole lot of it.  However, I feel as though there is a little."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Raymond Davis wearing leather jacket and standing in front of block building with store window with hat display on right
